description:
With their next opponents too injured to fight, Team Hokage automatically advances to the semi-finals. But Uruha Ma is filled with strange and deadly opponents... and Koganei`s got to fight first!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Invisible Foe! The Battle Against Fear!!
Mienai Teki Kyoufu to no Tatakai!!
見えない敵 恐怖との戦い!!
